title: Jasmine Yarbrough flashes her black bra beneath a see-through blouse
text:
She's the designer-loving blonde with a taste for the finer things in life.

And Jasmine Yarbrough was dressed to turn heads on Monday as she sauntered through Sydney Airport in a see-through brown blouse.

The wife of Karl Stefanovic, 34, proved she isn't shy to take a fashion risk as she boldly revealed a glimpse at her lacy black bra beneath the diaphanous top.

Sheer daring! Jasmine Yarbrough, 34, proved she isn't shy to take a fashion risk on Sunday as she boldly revealed a glimpse at her lacy black bra beneath a see-through blouse at Sydney Airport

The Mara & Mine co-founder completed her look with a pair of skinny black jodhpurs, strappy sandals and a Dior handbag worth a whopping $3,500.

She appeared to go makeup-free for the occasion and tied her flaxen locks into a no-fuss up-do.

Also on display was her $120,000 diamond engagement ring, which she received from Karl back in 2018.

Cha-ching! The Mara & Mine co-founder completed her look with a pair of skinny black jodhpurs, strappy sandals and a Dior handbag worth a whopping $3,500

Off-duty chic: She appeared to go makeup-free for the occasion and tied her flaxen locks into a no-fuss up-do

Ring-a-ding-ding! Also on display was her $120,000 diamond engagement ring, which she received from Karl back in 2018

Jasmine tied the knot with her axed Today show host husband in a lavish Mexican ceremony last December.

Earlier this year, fans began speculating over whether Jasmine is expecting her first child.

The chatter began after she shared a photo to Instagram in which she appeared to be hiding her tummy.

Chatting to hubby? At one stage, Jasmine was spotted pacing around the baggage claim while chatting on the phone

No baby news: Earlier this year, fans began speculating over whether Jasmine is expecting her first child - but her publicist had since denied the rumours

Their one-year anniversary is coming up! Jasmine tied the knot with her axed Today show host husband in a lavish Mexican ceremony last December

The photo caught fans' attention, with one person commenting: 'Are you sporting a baby bump there?'

Others agreed, with one eagle-eyed follower replying: 'You could be right!'

However, representatives for Karl and Jasmine denied they were expecting a child.
description: She's the designer-loving blonde with a taste for the finer things in life.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
